existing_features.title: Create a responsive marketing website for “Blaine’s Card Clinic” focused on TCG card cleaning and dent removal, with clear navigation and sections for overview, services, pricing/tiers, and contact.

Add a dedicated “Service Tiers” section that lists exactly three tiers with the provided names and descriptions: (1) Super Potion — “Professional Restoration Surface Care & Presentation Enhancement”, (2) Hyper Potion — “Advanced Recovery, Includes Creases, Dents, and Dings”, (3) Max Potion — “Comprehensive Restoration and Microscopic Level Precision”.

Implement a “Contact / Request a Quote” form that lets a visitor submit their name, email, and a message describing the cards/issues (e.g., creases, dents, dings) and submit it to the backend for storage.

Create and apply a cohesive visual theme for the site (colors, typography, spacing, components) that fits a “card restoration clinic” brand and is used consistently across all sections; avoid default/unstyled template look.

Add the required generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI (e.g., logo in header, hero image in the top section) without routing images through the backend.

Replace the current site logo asset with the user-uploaded logo image so the header and footer logo render the uploaded design at the existing logo path (/assets/generated/blaines-card-clinic-logo.dim_512x512.png).

Update the site color theme to better match the uploaded red-and-white logo by adjusting the Tailwind CSS theme variables (primary, accent, ring, destructive, and supporting neutrals) used across components, keeping text contrast accessible in both light and dark modes.

Ensure the site logo loads correctly by guaranteeing the logo file exists at the exact static path `/assets/generated/blaines-card-clinic-logo.dim_512x512.png` and is served from `frontend/public/assets/generated/` in the deployed build (no broken-image/blue-question-mark placeholder).

Replace the currently deployed logo asset at `/assets/generated/blaines-card-clinic-logo.dim_512x512.png` with the newly uploaded logo image (IMG_8094-2.png), keeping the filename used by the UI unchanged.
Update the header and footer logo rendering so the logo always appears as a true square (no stretching/expansion) and does not visually include/overlay any navigation tabs or header elements.
